name: test_e2e_with_logs[058_SQLI_UNION_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_UNION_006` |
| **Name** | User credential extraction attempt |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | union_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT username,password,NULL FROM users --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20username%2Cpassword%2CNULL%20FROM%20users%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 04:53:35.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_UNION_006-1767070415925-qi9iw9 pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_006 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20username%2Cpassword%2CNULL%20FROM%20users%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
04:53:35.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_UNION_006-1767070415925-qi9iw9 pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_006 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20username%2Cpassword%2CNULL%20FROM%20users%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
